properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , GR_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_IDNO , MEM_PHONE , MEM_MAIL , MEM_PROFILE , MEM_ENROLL_DATE , MEM_MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_ADM_FLAG FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?

INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER (MEM_NO , GR_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_IDNO , MEM_PHONE , MEM_MAIL , MEM_PROFILE , MEM_ENROLL_DATE , MEM_MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_ADM_FLAG) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMNO.NEXTVAL , 1 , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , null , sysdate , sysdate , 'Y' , 'U' )
SELECT MEM_ID FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND MEM_PHONE= ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_NAME = ? , MEM_MAIL = ? , MEM_PHONE = ? , MEM_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT MEM_NO , GR_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_IDNO , MEM_PHONE , MEM_MAIL , MEM_PROFILE , MEM_ENROLL_DATE , MEM_MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_ADM_FLAG FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? , MEM_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
SELECT GR_NAME FROM TB_GRADE JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(GR_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MCP WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT CP_NAME , CP_DISCOUNT , MCP_USE , MCP_END_DATE FROM TB_COUPON JOIN TB_MCP USING(CP_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_MCP (MCP_NO , CP_NO , MEM_NO , MCP_END_DATE) SELECT SEQ_MCNO.NEXTVAL , CP_NO , ? , CP_END_DATE FROM (SELECT CP_NO, CP_END_DATE FROM TB_COUPON WHERE CP_NAME = ?)
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
SELECT CP_NO , CP_NAME , CP_DISCOUNT , CP_END_DATE FROM TB_COUPON WHERE CP_END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND CP_DOWN = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_MCP (MCP_NO , CP_NO , MEM_NO , MCP_END_DATE) SELECT SEQ_MCNO.NEXTVAL , CP_NO , ? , ? FROM (SELECT CP_NO FROM TB_COUPON WHERE CP_NAME = ?)
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_PROFILE = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_PROFILE = '' WHERE MEM_ID = ?

INSERT INTO TB_CART ( MEM_NO , SPACE_NO , CART_LIMIT , CART_DATE , CART_IN , CART_OUT , CART_PARKING , CART_ANIMAL , CART_STAND , CART_CHAIR , CART_PRICE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
DELETE FROM TB_CART WHERE MEM_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TB_CART WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND SPACE_NO = ?

SELECT MEM_NO , SPACE_NO , CART_LIMIT , CART_DATE , CART_IN , CART_OUT , CART_PARKING , CART_ANIMAL , CART_STAND , CART_CHAIR , CART_PRICE , SPACE_NAME , SPACE_LIMIT , SPACE_PIC FROM TB_CART JOIN TB_SPACE USING(SPACE_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_CART SET CART_LIMIT = ? , CART_PARKING = ? , CART_ANIMAL = ? , CART_STAND = ? , CART_CHAIR = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND SPACE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_LOVE ( SPACE_NO , MEM_NO ) VALUES ( ? , ? )
DELETE FROM TB_LOVE WHERE SPACE_NO = ? AND MEM_NO = ?
SELECT SPACE_NO , MEM_NO FROM TB_LOVE WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_LOVE WHERE SPACE_NO = ? AND MEM_NO = ?
SELECT SPACE_NO , MEM_NO , LOVE_DATE , SPACE_NAME , SPACE_LIMIT , SPACE_PIC FROM TB_LOVE L JOIN TB_SPACE SP USING(SPACE_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT MEM_NO , SPACE_NO , CART_LIMIT , CART_DATE , CART_IN , CART_OUT , CART_PARKING , CART_ANIMAL , CART_STAND , CART_CHAIR , CART_PRICE , SPACE_NAME , SPACE_LIMIT , SPACE_PIC FROM TB_CART JOIN TB_SPACE USING(SPACE_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND SPACE_NAME = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "TODAY_MEM" FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(MEM_ENROLL_DATE,'yy/mm/dd') = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd') FROM DUAL)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "GOLD" FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE GR_NO = 3

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_IDNO , MEM_PHONE , MEM_MAIL , GR_NAME , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "BOOK_COUNT" FROM TB_BOOK B1 WHERE B1.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO )AS "BOOK_COUNT_ALL" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "BOOK_COUNT_MONTH" FROM TB_BOOK B2 WHERE B2.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO AND BOOK_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022.05.01', 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_DATE('2022-07-28', 'YYYY.MM.DD') )AS "BOOK_COUNT_MONTH" , ( SELECT SUM(BOOK_PRICE) FROM TB_BOOK B3 WHERE B3.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO )AS "BOOK_AMOUNT_ALL" , ( SELECT SUM(BOOK_PRICE) FROM TB_BOOK B4 WHERE B4.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO AND BOOK_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022.05.01', 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_DATE('2022-07-28', 'YYYY.MM.DD') )AS "BOOK_AMOUNT_MONTH" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "RPT_COUNT" FROM TB_REPORT R WHERE R.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO ) AS "RPT_COUNT" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LIKE_COUNT" FROM TB_LIKE L WHERE L.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO )AS "LIKE_COUNT" , MEM_STATUS , MEM_ADM_FLAG , MEM_ENROLL_DATE , MEM_MODIFY_DATE FROM TB_MEMBER MEM LEFT JOIN TB_GRADE USING (GR_NO)

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_IDNO , MEM_PHONE , MEM_MAIL , GR_NAME , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "BOOK_COUNT" FROM TB_BOOK B1 WHERE B1.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO )AS "BOOK_COUNT_ALL" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "BOOK_COUNT_MONTH" FROM TB_BOOK B2 WHERE B2.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO AND BOOK_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022.05.01', 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_DATE('2022-07-28', 'YYYY.MM.DD') )AS "BOOK_COUNT_MONTH" , ( SELECT SUM(BOOK_PRICE) FROM TB_BOOK B3 WHERE B3.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO )AS "BOOK_AMOUNT_ALL" , ( SELECT SUM(BOOK_PRICE) FROM TB_BOOK B4 WHERE B4.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO AND BOOK_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022.05.01', 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_DATE('2022-07-28', 'YYYY.MM.DD') )AS "BOOK_AMOUNT_MONTH" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "RPT_COUNT" FROM TB_REPORT R WHERE R.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO ) AS "RPT_COUNT" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "LIKE_COUNT" FROM TB_LIKE L WHERE L.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO )AS "LIKE_COUNT" , MEM_STATUS , MEM_ADM_FLAG , MEM_ENROLL_DATE , MEM_MODIFY_DATE FROM TB_MEMBER MEM LEFT JOIN TB_GRADE USING (GR_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT CP_NO , CP_NAME , CP_DISCOUNT , CP_ENROLL_DATE FROM TB_COUPON
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_ADM_FLAG = 'A'
INSERT INTO TB_COUPON (CP_NO , CP_NAME , CP_DISCOUNT , CP_ENROLL_DATE , CP_END_DATE , CP_DOWN) VALUES( SEQ_CPNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_MCP (MCP_NO , CP_NO , MEM_NO , MCP_END_DATE) SELECT SEQ_MCNO.NEXTVAL , ? , MEM_NO , ? FROM (SELECT MEM_NO FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE GR_NO = ?)
INSERT INTO TB_MCP (MCP_NO , CP_NO , MEM_NO , MCP_END_DATE) SELECT SEQ_MCNO.NEXTVAL , ? , MEM_NO , ? FROM (SELECT MEM_NO FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?)
INSERT INTO TB_MCP (MCP_NO , CP_NO , MEM_NO , MCP_END_DATE) SELECT SEQ_MCNO.NEXTVAL , ? , MEM_NO , ? FROM (SELECT MEM_NO FROM TB_MEMBER)
